tags: []
title: "See the Northern Lights"
---

The Northern Lights, or Aurora Borealis, are one of the most awe-inspiring natural light displays on earth. Dancing waves of green, purple, and pink fill the night sky, creating a spectacle that leaves you breathless.

Why it’s a must-do

Bucket-list phenomenon: The Northern Lights are unpredictable, and seeing them is often a once-in-a-lifetime event.
Connection with nature: The experience is deeply humbling, making you feel small yet connected to the vast universe.
Best places to see them

Norway: Tromsø is one of the best places to view the lights.
Iceland: A combination of stunning landscapes and aurora viewing makes it a favorite.
Finland: Stay in a glass igloo in Lapland for a unique viewing experience.
Best time to go
Between September and March, during long, dark nights.

Pro tip
Check aurora forecasts and book a multi-day trip to increase your chances of catching the lights.
